author: Captain David Bowley
content: Images run through much too fast so cannot appreciate any one of them!

author: Alan R. Wilson
content: Whyever the rapidity of the images/video shots ? 3-5 seconds each would be far more satisfying. The continuous fliker is only distracting. Peace.

author: Seymour Hamilton
content: I particularly liked the shot of the camels — “the ships of the desert”

author: Phil
content:
“Ship Shooter”?
Needs a name change or people will think he/she is firing guns and rifles at ships.
